Text: Outline for proposed agreementis the info we discussed earlier Thanks Gerald Forwarded by Gerald LoftonHOUECT on PM Rusty NRONDEVELOPMENT AM To Robert D CT cc Gerald CT Subject Outline for proposed agreement Bill I have revised the following to reflect what we discussed today As an afterthought the only additional thing I would like to change is Item to reflect minimum of twice or as deemed appropriate such as after a bad storm or when unauthorized visitors are reported at the site The following is a list of services for Texaco Pipelines LLC to monitor the leaching of the new cavern A fixed fee of per month invoiced monthly will provide Enron with the following services Visual and physical inspection of the pump wellhead and associated equipment minimum twice in hours or as deemed appropriate Pump pad oil as required Backwash well twice a week Communicatecoordinate with DOW on fresh water supply and brine delivery Routine maintenance and troubleshooting on well and associated equipment eg turbine meters valve actuators etc Monitor sump area to avoid overflow Write rd party work permits for any contract work being done on the pump and well area Start and stop fresh water booster pump as needed Block in well in preparation for well logging Obtain monthly electrical meter readings for Enron to verify direct billing from Coastal Corp to Enron Maintain files on well data Forward Enron invoices to Enron in Houston For any maintenance activities special projects or other service requests that extend beyond the hoursday covered in the monthly fixed fee Texaco Pipelines LLC will invoice at hour For contract services or materials purchased by Texaco Pipelines LLC on behalf of Enron Texaco will invoice Enron at cost plus
